full_summary:
### PWGSC TBIPS ServiceNow Requirement

#### Tender Information:

* Reference Number: cb-837-90865507
* Solicitation Number: PWGSC-20240892
* Publication Date: September 25, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 20, 2023, 2:00 p.m. ET
* Status: Expired

#### Procurement Details:

* Procurement Category: SRV (Service)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Solicitation Method: Request for Proposal
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Trade Agreements: CFTA (Canadian Free Trade Agreement) does not apply to this procurement
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Canada

#### Description of Work:

The Integrated Service Management program requires IT professional services resources with specialized knowledge of ServiceNow, specifically business processes mapping and service management workflows. The requirement is on an “as and when requested” basis, mainly in the National Capital Region (NCR) and across Canada. Security requirements are associated with this requirement.

#### Key Deadlines:

* October 18, 2023: New closing date for AMD001 NPP
* October 20, 2023: New closing date for AMD002 NPP and overall tender process

#### Set-Aside Information:

This procurement is voluntarily set aside for Indigenous businesses under the federal government’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses (PSIB). It is open only to those Indigenous TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region.

#### Contact Information:

* Name: Thérèse Richer
* Email: [Therese.Richer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Therese.Richer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 574-2636
* Address: 10 Wellington Street, Gatineau, Ontario K1A 0S5, Canada
